articles.title: NASA says its photo of a 'rainbow' on Mars is actually a lens flare - sorry - Business Insider South Africa
articles.description: The account for NASA's Perseverance rover tweeted the explanation on Tuesday and said many people had asked whether the photo showed a rainbow.
articles.content:
NASA released a photo of what looks like a rainbow on Mars but said it actually just shows a lens flare.

articles.title: The youngest billionaire in the world right now is a teenager in Germany - Business Insider South Africa
articles.description: Forbes' 35th annual billionaires list knocked Kylie Jenner from its ranks and put 18-year-old Kevin David Lehmann in the top spot.
articles.content:
It's good to be Kevin David Lehman. 
Lehman, 18, is worth $3.3 billion after inheriting stakes in German drugstore chain dm-drogerie markt from his father, Guenther Lehmann. That's according to Forb… [+2158 chars]

articles.title: AstraZeneca Benefits Outweigh Risks - Madhi - iAfrica.com
articles.description: The benefits of the AstraZeneca COVID-19 vaccine far outweigh the risks, according to Wits University Vaccinology Professor Shabir Madhi.
articles.content:
The benefits of the AstraZeneca COVID-19 vaccine far outweigh the risks, according to Wits University Vaccinology Professor Shabir Madhi. 
He says that almost every vaccine has minor side effects.
